channel.title: [detla] Costum items keep on death [317]
channel.description:
heey i made 2 costum swords and if u die u keep them both u wont lose them :S
how to fix this or put them on a list u lose them???

item.title: [detla] Costum items keep on death [317]
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“Ddragonimp, post:2, topic:378204”]Uhh that is really odd since your suppose to loose everything… i use delta and i dont have a code that says Keep custom items…

Just look to see if the Item id is bigger then the Max listed in your item.java
should say MaxItems = 12000 or something wrong computer sorry
just increase that item to 20000
and add the item to the item.cfg file if its not in[/quote]

There is a way too keep items. Use the fire cape keeping on death for reference.

Read full topic
